name: Right to Access
description: Patient right to access own health information

name: Right to Amend
description: Patient right to amend health information

name: Right to Accounting of Disclosures
description: Patient right to know who accessed PHI

name: Right to Confidential Communication
description: Patient right to request confidential methods

name: Right to Restrict Use/Disclosure
description: Patient right to restrict PHI use

name: Right to Receive Notice
description: Patient right to receive privacy notice

name: Right to Breach Notification
description: Patient right to be notified of breaches

name: Right to Complaint
description: Patient right to file privacy complaints
